title: FS: N172 Old Judge Arthur Irwin portrait -SGC 40 -Taking Offers
author: the-illini

posts.post_title: FS: N172 Old Judge Arthur Irwin portrait -SGC 40 -Taking Offers
posts.post_content:
I upgraded my Irwin portrait in the last REA auction so I am making this one available for sale. Solid image, SGC 40, clean back. $500 delivered. PM with questions or to confirm purchase.

Thanks

Chris
Bump - taking offers on this one...
Bump - taking offers. Pretty cool portrait of the only Old Judge subject known to have had two wives at the same time!
